level.text: No person shall engage in the business of an alarm dealer within the boundaries of the District of Columbia without first obtaining from the Director an alarm dealer’s license, as required by ยง5 of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง7-2804 (2001)) and this chapter.

Application for an alarm dealer’s license shall be made on a form prescribed by the Director and shall contain a notarized statement that the information contained in the application is true and correct.
